page.title: 09Restoring Ripon's Canal.
page.content: {The Ripon Canal Society}is hoping to reopen the canal as far as the canal basin near the centre of Ripon. The society aims to restore the canal, all of its features and installations back to working order. This also means that efforts must be made to prevent any more damage to any part of the canal and its features. There are several important historical features to be preserved. The society hopes to encourage people to use the canal for recreation and pleasure. The reopening of the canal will mean renewed links for the middle of Ripon with the River Ure and the Ouse Navigation. The society is working with the British Waterways Board to provide what will be an important attraction in the centre of Ripon. As in many things, this will take time.
